trigger.name: Battery is not been charging on {HOST.NAME}
Battery Low Warning on {HOST.NAME} is higher 45V
Battery Voltage on {HOST.NAME} is lower then 50

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Alpha FXM2000:upsInputFrequency.last(0)}<58 or {Template SNMP Alpha FXM2000:upsInputFrequency.last(0)}>62
trigger.name: Input Frequency on {HOST.NAME} is less 58Hz or higher 62Hz

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Alpha FXM2000:upsInputVoltage.last(0)}<105 or {Template SNMP Alpha FXM2000:upsInputVoltage.last(0)}>125
trigger.name: Input Voltage on {HOST.NAME} is less 105V or higher 125V

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Alpha FXM2000:upsOutputVoltage.last(0)}<105 or {Template SNMP Alpha FXM2000:upsOutputVoltage.last(0)}>125
trigger.name: Output Voltage on {HOST.NAME} is less 105V or higher 125V
Something is with battery on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Something is with battery on {HOST.NAME}. Go to web interface and investigate.
